text: Denis Sergeyevich Spirin (; born 2 January 1980 in Mineralnye Vody) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:People from Mineralnye Vody Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Elista players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Baltika Kaliningrad players Category:FC Volgar Astrakhan players Category:FC Dynamo Bryansk players Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Stavropol Krai
title: Denis Spirin
